content: so no matter where you start stitching it s still going to fit perfectly remember you have 30 stitches on both pieces you can see how i m lining each stitch up to get a perfect closure in the first pic in the second pic i am making sure to get both loops of the bottom piece both loops in the top piece and a piece of the white patch as well here i ve inserted the tape measurer end into one ear and used my tail to tighten it up snuggle so it doesn t fall off later but don t tighten it so much that the tape scrunches up page 6 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com here are some shots of the monkey we just finished and some others page 7 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
